description.en:
This mod adds two new paintable textures to the game: Prairie Grass & Tall Prairie Grass.
To fully install, a change will be needed to the map that you are playing on. Please see the installation instructions in README.md for more information.
PRAIRIE GRASS FEATURES - Mowable with standard mowers directly into Hay - 4 growth stages, mowable at 3rd stage just like Meadow grass - Two variants Tall and Normal - NOT Plantable as a crop
Tall Prairie Grass - Grows 50% taller than standard meadow grass - Results in 20% more harvest than standard meadow grass. - Costs 20% more to paint
Prairie Grass - Grows 20% taller than standard meadow grass - Results in 10% more harvest than standard meadow grass. - Costs 10% more to paint
